---
id: QueryTrade
title: 查询成交记录
sidebar_label: 查询成交记录
sidebar_position: 1
description: /spot/v4/trade
---

**类型:** GET

**描述:** `/spot/v4/trade`

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 是否必需 | 默认值 | 描述 | 取值范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | 否 |  | 交易对，如不填写则代表全部 |  |
| `bizType` | string | 否 |  | SPOT, LEVER |  |
| `orderSide` | string | 否 |  | BUY, SELL |  |
| `orderType` | string | 否 |  | LIMIT, MARKET |  |
| `orderId` | number | 否 |  |  |  |
| `fromId` | number | 否 |  | 起始 ID |  |
| `direction` | string | 否 |  | 查询方向：PREV, NEXT |  |
| `limit` | number | 否 | 20 | 限制数量，最大 100 |  |
| `startTime` | number | 否 |  | 开始时间，例如：1657682804112 |  |
| `endTime` | number | 否 |  |  |  |

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": true,
    "hasNext": true,
    "items": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
        "tradeId": "6316559590087222001",
        "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
        "orderSide": "BUY",
        "orderType": "LIMIT",
        "bizType": "SPOT",
        "time": 1655958915583,
        "price": "40000",
        "quantity": "1.2",
        "quoteQty": "48000", // 成交金额
        "baseCurrency": "BTC",
        "quoteCurrency": "USDT",
        "fee": "0.5",
        "feeCurrency": "USDT",
        "takerMaker": "taker" // taker 或 maker
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
